commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The nine contests of the school idols! Next up is a dance off!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That's fitting for school idols.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah! But this...is an arcade?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Wait, is it going to be a dance off in a game?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Exactly! Whoever gets the higher score wins.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Eli will be competing for μ's. Who are you going to choose?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'm pretty confident when it comes to dance games. Leave this one to me.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Let's have fun today, Karin.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yes, I'm looking forward to it, Eli.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Eli used to take ballet. She dances so beautifully.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: So that's how she moves so elegantly. I think I get it now.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Karin is so sexy when she dances. I can't take my eyes off of either of them!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Huh? More and more people are gathering around.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: You're right! I guess everyone wants to see what all the fun is about.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: *Giggle* It can't be helped when someone like me is around!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I know! Instead of just going by the score, why don't we get the audience to judge too?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wait, can we do that?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Great idea! This is going to be a good contest!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Everyone! Thank you so much for coming! We're going to have an in-game dance off in a second, and we need your help!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: When they finish dancing, please clap for the one that you thought was better!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Let me hear you! Let's all enjoy dancing together!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Eli makes it seem like the audience is doing it with her!)

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: So we can join in too, right?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Let's cheer for Eli and Karin!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Karin, let's have your performance first.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Karin, do your best!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'm planning on it!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Eli's dancing is elegant, but the people like my sexy style! I'll win the crowd over.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Looking good, now turn!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Karin hasn't missed a beat! This must be thanks to their extra tough practices lately.)

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That's it!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Whew. How'd I do?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: What a score! 96!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I knew you could do it, Karin. *Pat* *Pat*

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: That was amazing! Perfect!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Chuckle* I can't wait to see what you got, Eli.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Then let's get started!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Jump, then a step!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Eli isn't just staring at the screen. She's showing the crowd, too!)

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: What a nice smile.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Thank you, everyone!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Eli's dance was great!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: The results are going to show up any second. Oh, she got a 96!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Wait, a tie?! They were both incredible, but that's surprising.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: We still need the audience's opinion. We'll make that the final judgment.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Okay, let's have it. Who here thought Karin's performance was better?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Everyone's smiling and cheering for Karin. Looks like they really enjoyed it.)

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Well, I can't say I didn't expect that.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Okay, now for Eli. Who thought she performed better?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wha... Holy moly!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I can't believe it... Thank you so much for the applause!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: The audience is overwhelmingly in her favor. Everyone sure is honest.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That makes this one win for us!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Karin was so good though. Too bad.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Hahaha... Thanks. I thought it'd be a little closer than that.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Eli, thanks. I'm really glad I got to see you dance up close.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Me too! Looks like we'll be good rivals.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That makes it 1 - 1. Where are we going to do the next one?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Sorry, but I have something to take care of. You guys go on ahead.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, but...

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Come on, let's go. I'll take you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I was so confident.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: If I can't win over the audience, I want to at least get a better score.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I have to work even harder.
